column4: Is there anyway to capture a digital vidoe that is playing in WMP on the web? THere is no way for me to download it directly from the site.
I think something like mencoder/mplayer could do that...
It uses an activex control to disply it.
have you got the location of the stream?
the url of the page it is embeedded on, yes
well then you might want to try reading its source to track down the originating media.
I haven't got the time to myself. I'm afraid you'll just have to read the source to hunt it down if you really want to.
have you tried plugging it in?
I don't think it's a USB mass storage device
I just plugged it in, he'res what appeared in dmesg: http://pastebin.ca/924694
hm... I was able to access it with "rioutil" , but sadly it's CLI only
having a CLI only interface for this music player is probably a good thing, cause it forced me to relearn some basic BASH "while" loops.
now a question, the files, when downloaded, now have "filenames" like "C:\Foo\Bar\baz.wma" . (see http://pastebin.ca/924713). Is there a regexp I can use to strip all but what's after the \ ?
